During this update, your data remains fully secure. The update is performed directly on your device, and your synced data remains unaffected. We‚Äôll just copy it to a new format, and a local backup will be created on your device, containing all your data in the previous format.
The reason we‚Äôre retaining this backup is to debug and assist you, in case of unforeseen.
